title: This new ZAGG stylus is a cheaper, more colorful Apple Pencil alternative
description: iPad owners looking to save money could bypass the Apple Pencil and get the ZAGG Pro Stylus 2 instead.

title: Grab these Adobe Photoshop alternatives for just $13 at Newegg
description: Looking for an alternative to Adobe Creative Cloud? Corel PaintShop Pro and AfterShot Pro 3 let you sketch, paint, and edit photos just like in Photoshop and Lightroom, for way less money.

title: New York City just banned TikTok on government devices. Here's why
description: New York City government officials announced that city employees have 30 days to delete TikTok from city-owned devices.

title: Learn how to create a ChatGPT AI bot with this course bundle
description: Upgrade your AI skills with this ChatGPT and Python coding bundle deal.

title: This simple trick disables ads in Gmail - but there's a catch
description: If you depend on Gmail for your email communication, but you're tired of seeing ads in your inbox, there's a simple way to get rid of them, though it may mean swapping one problem for another.

title: The best headphones of 2023: Expert reviewed and compared
description: These top headphones turn your ordinary music- or podcast-listening sessions into surround sound experiences.

title: This 4-in-1 charging cable from Nomad means I'm never without the right cable
description: Nomad's 'universal' cable is also covered in double-braided Kevlar for extra durability.

title: LG just rolled out a $1,000 briefcase TV, and it's weirdly compelling
description: Who hasn't wanted to take their TV outside occasionally?

title: New CrossOver 23 out for better Windows gameplay on MacOS, ChromeOS, and Linux
description: For when you really, really need to run a Windows program, but you really, really can't stand Windows.

title: Google paves way for FIDO2 security keys that can resist quantum computer attacks
description: Google wants your security keys to be up for the challenges that quantum computers will present.

title: The great Flipper Zero shortage of 2023 has finally come to end
description: I like everything about the Flipper Zero, except the way it was always out of stock, pushing buyers to overpriced third-party sellers.

title: Otter.ai partners with Slack to share meeting insights with your team
description: The new application can take notes, assign action items, share insights, and more.

title: Banks defending their right to security are missing the point about consumer trust
description: When businesses overwrite a customer's security decision, does it make them fully liable when a breach occurs? That's a question banks like those in Singapore need to consider before they roll out their next security feature.
